snippet: LEAD: Perhaps best known for hot tubs, dancing raisins and ''Governor Moonbeam,'' California is without question the most diverse state in the country - geographically, racially and culturally. I was raised here and I'm proud to be a Californian. ...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Perhaps best known for hot tubs, dancing raisins and ''Governor Moonbeam,'' California is without question the most diverse state in the country - geographically, racially and culturally. I was raised here and I'm proud to be a Californian. But as a legislator for 16 years, I've traveled around the country talking to folks who just shake their heads in wonder at our unusual politics.

byline.original: By John Garamendi; John Garamendi, a Democrat, is a California State Senator
